title: A nevve ballade intituled, Agaynst rebellious and false rumours To the nevve tune of the Blacke Almaine, vpon Scissillia.
author: Bette, Thomas.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Fletestreat at the signe of the Faucon by VVylliam Gryffith, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Sainct Dunstones Churchyarde,
